item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, June 2, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ministers threaten to bring down Israeli government over ‘reckless’ Gaza ceasefire plan
2. [Opinion] The shock of the old
3. Number of UK grads opting for professional services is policy ‘failure’, says ex-Shell CEO
4. Exit polls forecast decisive majority for Narendra Modi in India’s election
5. [Opinion] The great hospitality gripe list
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, June 2, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
